text: Aspergillus leucocarpus is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Aspergillus section. The species was first described in 1969.Hadlok, R.; Stolk, A.C. 1969. Eurotium leucocarpum sp.nov. Antonie van Leeuwenhoek. 35(1):9-12 It has been reported to produce an apolar indoloterpene, echinulins, epiheveadrides, and neoechinulins. == References == leucocarpus Category:Fungi described in 1969
title: Aspergillus leucocarpus
